Policy and privacy

Important information read me.

NicVPN: Apply a CheckMate to any firewalls, secure application Unblock websites, applications and content | Speed ​​up your connection | Keep your activities safe, secure and private.

Our application does not extract any type of information of any kind you are not interested in. For this reason our application for your security Google Play Store before an application is published or in each update, in the application store they verify they perform a validation of the source code of the application and then it is approved, Google does not allow applications that extract information, viruses, scan, hacks or any other type of these from these.


For this reason, if you receive a third party message, ignore this type of comments, also remembering with the help of Google Play Protect, it is an excellent detector of applications Google Play Store is already active by default on all phones.


Google Play Protect:

* Check the security of Google Play Store apps before downloading them.

* Scans device activity to detect potentially harmful apps from other sources, known as malicious software.

* Warns you about any potentially harmful apps it has found and removes it from your device.

* Alerts you to any app that violates our Unwanted Software Policy by hiding or misrepresenting important information.

* It sends you privacy alerts about apps that can obtain user permissions to access your personal information, which constitutes a breach of our Developer Policy.

More information:

https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/2812853

Corrected route %1$s/%2$s to %3$s/%2$s Cannot access the Android Keychain Certificates. This can be caused by a firmware upgrade or by restoring a backup of the app/app settings. Assuming \"subnet\" topology. Ignoring multicast route: %s Restarting OpenVPN Service (App crashed probably crashed or killed for memory pressure) No allowed app added. Adding ourselves (%s) to have at least one app in the allowed app list to not allow all apps Preferred native ABI precedence of this device (%1$s) and ABI reported by native libraries (%2$s) mismatch VPN permission revoked by OS (e.g. other VPN program started), stopping VPN tls-auth file is missing Missing user certificate or user certifcate key file Missing CA certificate Reread (%d) log items from log cache file Waiting %ss seconds between connection attempt Config uses option tls-remote that was deprecated in 2.3 and finally removed in 2.4 %.0f bit/s %.1f kbit/s %.1f Mbit/s %.1f Gbit/s %.0f B %.1f kB %.1f MB %.1f GB Connection statistics Ongoing statistics of the established OpenVPN connection Connection status change Status changes of the OpenVPN connection (Connecting, authenticating,…) An external app tries to control %s. The app requesting access cannot be determined. Allowing this app grants ALL apps access. The OpenVPN 3 C++ implementation does not support static keys. Please change to OpenVPN 2.x under general settings. Using PKCS12 files directly with OpenVPN 3 C++ implementation is not supported. Please import the pkcs12 files into the Android keystore or change to OpenVPN 2.x under general settings. OpenVPN 3 C++ implementation does not support connecting via Socks proxy Orbot application cannot be found. Please install Orbot or use manual Socks v5 integration. Cannot use extra http-proxy-option statement and Orbot integration at the same time User interaction required OpenVPN connection requires a user input, e.g. two factor authentication Open URL to continue VPN authentication Answer challenge to continue VPN authentication Authentication pending Unknown state AUTO Automatic Server FastDNS Beta: Our connection method both as a server and as a client is on a beta basis at times our servers can be terribly slow or like many errors, we are currently working hard to make it very fast, and finish our beta phase. Possibly our servers are slow due to large numbers of users connected, soon we will have fast servers that support large numbers of users. This connection method can be terribly slow, you can navigate a maximum of 2-3 mb of velocity. The recommended mode that is used is the connection only if it is the only method that works for you. (Use our VPN Segments tool to speed it up a little more, these values will depend on your connection, we recommend using a value between 1 and 20, this option is found in the VPN configuration) Battery Optimization We recommend removing the battery restrictions this may cause disconnection in the background after a long time, remove the restrictions now to avoid disconnection from the VPN -> Don\'t optimize) or simply tap here!
